overview: Alec delivers a package of dildos for Jayden and gets in on the fun. Jenny's job is on the line because she's got sex on her mind all day and can't focus on her work. The boss' daughter does more than just flirt with the workers, Chris decides to try his luck. Scott's job is being reviewed and his boss, Tori Black thinks that there are a few things he can improve on. Priya goes to Talon for help at work after dipping into company funds for personal usage. Talon takes advantage of the situation.
title: Office Perverts 2
